title: Tig Boromar
text: Tig Boromar is an honorary professor of Economics at [[Morgrave University]] in [[Sharn]]. Although she is an heir to one of the [[Sixty Families|Sixty]] of [[Sharn]] and the daughter of a [[City Councilwoman|Ilyra Boromar]], Tig Boromar set aside her family’s wealth and power and received her education on the streets of [[Sharn]]. Her //Competition in Callestan// is a brilliant analysis of the market forces at play in the [[lower ward]]s. “Professor Tig” encourages her students to approach her with their own financial problems, as she has a range of optional assignments for those who want to earn more than extra credit.
